General.Name: Globus Spirits Limited
General.Description: Globus Spirits Limited manufactures and sells alcohol in India. The company offers Indian made Indian liquor and Indian made foreign liquor products. It is involved in franchise bottling, bulk alcohol, and hand sanitizer production activities. The company exports its products. Globus Spirits Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: The Mira Corporate Suites, New Delhi, India, 110065
